overview: GPT-5.2-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GPT-5.2-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability in GitHub Copilot
bullets: You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot model picker from any of the following:
Visual Studio Code in all modes: chat, ask, edit, agent
Copilot coding agent (Copilot Pro and Pro+ subscribers only)
Rollout will be gradual. If you don’t see the new models yet, check back soon.

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Enterprise and Business plans : Administrators must enable the OpenAI GPT-5.2-Codex in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see the respective model in the Copilot model picker.
Pro and Pro+ plans : Users can enable the model by selecting it in the model picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
Bring your own key : Within Visual Studio Code, select Manage Models from the picker, choose OpenAI GPT-5.2-Codex , and enter your API key when prompted.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more
bullets: To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.
